relatedRecords.name: Byteconf Flutter 2020
relatedRecords.description: Byteconf Flutter is a 100% free conference with the best Flutter speakers and teachers in the world. Conferences are great, but flights, hotels, and tickets are expensive, so not everyone can go. Byteconf is streamed on YouTube, for free, so anyone and everyone can attend.
